We don't document private classes.
 
Having said that, I'll break that rule=
 here :-) The goal of a
ComparisonCompactor is to take two strings that dif=
fer and produce two
strings that describe their difference. It does this by=
 finding and mostly
eliminating common prefix and suffix substrings. This w=
orks well in the
common case that the strings only differ in one area.
 
Re=
gards,
 
Kent Beck
Three Rivers Institute
